# UHost Class Package

Used Package by @uys2000\u-auth and some other packages.  

```typescript
export type Environment = "local" | "test" | "production";

export class UHost {
  local: string;
  test: string;
  production: string;
  host: string;
  constructor(
    environment: Environment,
    service: string,
    local?: string,
    test?: string,
    production?: string
  );
}
```
